DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial compare benefit possible adverse event two antibiotic treatment mild moderate acne . It expect minocycline microgranules effective lymecycline well adverse event profile .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Comparison Minocycline Microgranules Versus Lymecycline Treatment Mild Moderate Acne
DOC.criteria: Both gender 14 30 year old Mild moderate acne Face localization At least 20 noninflammatory lesion OR At least 15 inflammatory lesion OR At least 30 total lesion AND Less 5 nodular lesion Patients young 14 old 30 year old Less 20 noninflammatory lesion OR Less 15 inflammatory lesion OR Less 30 total lesion Patients severe acne More 5 nodular lesion OR More 50 inflammatory lesion OR More 125 total lesion Pregnant woman Lactating woman
